statement.p: A kite is a quadrilateral with two pairs of adjacents sides of equal length (think of simple ones you can fly).

A kite has two sides of length \displaystyle{a}={b}={8.5} and two sides of length \displaystyle{c}={d}={8.7} (all measured in yards). The angle between the largest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={51}^\circ.
What is the area of this kite? ydÂ²
